sen.j: 打太刀（うちたち）とは、武術（特に剣術）、武道（特に剣道）において用いられる用語の一つ。
sen.e: Uchitachi is one of the terms used in martial art, especially in swordplay, and Budo (martial arts), especially in Japanese art of fencing.

sen.j: 型（形）を行う際に仕太刀に倒される（技を受ける）役の人物を意味する。
sen.e: The term "Uchitachi" indicates a person who has the role to be defeated by Shidachi, or to receive Shidachi's techniques, in kata (standard form of a movement, posture, etc.) practice.
The term "uchitachi" indicates a person who has the role of being defeated by a shidachi, or to defend against that shidachi's techniques, in kata (standard form of a movement or posture) practice.

sen.j: 日本剣道形では単に倒されるだけでなく、常に一瞬早く動き仕太刀の動作を引き出してやる師匠役でもあり、また、全て避けられることになっているとは言え打太刀からも技を打つ。
sen.e: In Nihon Kendo Kata, Uchitachi not only is defeated but also plays the role as an instructor who always moves one step earlier to withdraw Shidachi's movement and, though all Uchitachi's techniques are to be evaded, also initiates movement to attack.
